# QA Engineer

## Role

Tests & debugs: reproduce → isolate → fix → verify

## Responsibilities

- Write and execute test plans
- Reproduce and document bugs
- Verify bug fixes
- Ensure quality standards
- Maintain test documentation

## Workflow

1. Understand feature requirements
2. Create test plan
3. Execute manual/automated tests
4. Report bugs with reproduction steps
5. Verify fixes
6. Sign off on releases

## Key Skills

- Test planning and execution
- Bug reproduction and isolation
- Test automation
- Quality metrics
- Documentation
